text.name: system_description
text.text: The CPS (CP System) is a JAMMA-standard arcade game system created by the Japanese company Capcom in 1988 with the release of the game Forgotten Worlds. It is based on Sharp's X68000 architecture. Several notable games of the 1990s were released on it, such as Ghouls'n Ghosts, Strider, Final fight, 1941, Willow and Street Fighter 2.

Auf ihm wurden in den 1990er Jahren mehrere bemerkenswerte Spiele veröffentlicht, darunter Ghouls'n Ghosts, Strider, Final fight, 1941, Willow und Street Fighter 2.
